data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today I.E. February 10 2026.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 (read with Part A of Schedule III) and 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 as amended (SEBI Listing Regulations) and based on the recommendation of the Audit Committee please be informed that the Board of Directors of the Indef Manufacturing Limited (Company) at its meeting held today i.e. on February 10 2026 inter alia has unanimously considered and approved the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and Nine Months ended December 31 2025 along with the Limited Review Reports provided by the Statutory Auditors thereon

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Under Regulation 29 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: Indef Manufacturing Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 10/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve unaudited financial results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On August 12 2025
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 (read with Part A of Schedule III) and 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board
of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 as amended (SEBI
Listing Regulations) and based on the recommendation of the Audit Committee please be informed
that the Board of Directors of the Indef Manufacturing Limited (Company) at its meeting held today i.e.
on August 12 2025 inter alia has unanimously considered and approved the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated
Financial Results of the Company for the first quarter ended June 30 2025 along with the Limited
Review Reports provided by the Statutory Auditors thereon.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Consideration Of The Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated).
data.news_body: Indef Manufacturing Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 12/08/2025 inter alia to consider and approve the un-audited financial results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the first quarter ended June 30 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Updates on Acquisition
data.news_body: Indef Manufacturing Limited has executed share purchase agreement today i.e. August 01 2025 for acquisition of 80% Equity Shares in Daedalus Lift & Access Equipments Private Limited

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Updates on Acquisition
data.news_body: Execution of Share Purchase Agreement for acquisition of 80% Equity Shares in Daedlus Lif & Access Equipments Private Limited.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of Indef Manufacturing Limited in its meeting held today has approved investment of Rs. 5.07 Crores through acquisition of 80 % Stake (Equity) in Daedalus Lift & Access Equipments Private Limited

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Board Has Approved Acquisition Of 80% Equity Shares In Daedalus Lift & Access Equipments Private Limited
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today approved an investment of ?5.07 crores through the acquisition of 80% equity shares in Daedalus Lift & Access Equipments Private Limited.

data.caption: Clarification sought from Indef Manufacturing Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Indef Manufacturing Ltd on June 9 2025 with reference to significant movement in price in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Dividend Updates
data.news_body:
we wish to inform you that The Board of Directors has recommended a Final Dividend of Rupees 2/- per share for the year 2024-25.

However In our earlier communication for the outcome we has inadvertently mentioned as 1.5 per share. We regret the error and  clarify that the correct amount is Rs. 2/-.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
1. Approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and financial year ended March 31 2025 
2. Recommended a Final Dividend of Rs. 1.5 (150%) per Equity Share (of face value of Re. 1 each) for the financial year ended March 31 2025 subject to approval of the shareholders of the Company i
3. Convening of 3rd Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Company on Monday August 12 2025 at 04.30 P.M. (IST) through Video Conferencing (VC) /Other Audio-Visual Means (OAVM);
4. Appointment of Mr. Vandan Shah as the Additional Non-Executive Non-Independent Director and reconsitution of Stakeholder Relationship committee
5. Taken on record the resignation of Mr. Nirav Nayan Bajaj (DIN: 08472468) Non-executive Director with effect from the closure of business hours on May 27 2025 on account of personal reason

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Indef Manufacturing Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from February 21 2025 the equity shares of Indef Manufacturing Ltd (Scrip Code: 544364) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of T Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250219-29 dated February 19 2025.
